title: Georgia House 2026 - Day 4 PM Session
summary:
# Georgia House 2026 - Day 4 PM Session

## Overview
This session featured recognitions and announcements, including honoring the legacy of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and a representative's grandson's birthday. There was discussion of upcoming events and committee meetings, but no substantive legislative action detected.

## Key Actions
No bills passed or referred.

## Bills Introduced (First Reading)
None detected.

## Notable Moments
- Representative Barry gave a speech honoring the life and legacy of Rev. Dr. Martin Luther King Jr., calling on the House to legislate with justice, mercy, and humility.
- Representative Scott recognized her grandson Lucas' 13th birthday.
- Representative Emory Dunahoo announced he has been providing daily devotions to members, with 4 colleagues joining him, but that this will be his last year doing so.

## Votes
No recorded votes.

## Attendance
Quorum present, no issues noted.

## Adjournment
The House adjourned until 10 AM on Friday, January 16th, 2026.
